Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Korean Saju Guide ("the Website"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Website.

Description of Service

Korean Saju Guide provides educational content and interactive tools related to the Korean Four Pillars (Saju) tradition. Our services include:

  • Saju Calculator for generating Four Pillars charts
  • Compatibility analysis tool
  • Educational guides and articles

Entertainment Purpose Only

The content and tools provided on this Website are for entertainment, cultural education, and personal reflection purposes only. They are not intended to provide professional advice of any kind, including but not limited to:

  • Medical or health advice
  • Legal advice
  • Financial or investment advice
  • Psychological or therapeutic advice
  • Career or business advice

You should not make important life decisions based solely on Saju readings or any content on this Website.

No Guarantees

We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any Saju calculations, interpretations, or content on this Website. Saju is a traditional cultural practice and should be understood as such—not as a scientifically proven method of prediction.
